data.text:
Residence Pineta 1

Arzachena

Set close to the pinewood in Baja Sardinia and 5 km from Porto Cervo in the Emerald Coast, Residence Pineta 1 offers modern apartments with a dishwasher. Baja Sardinia’s beach is a 5-minute walk from the apartments... view moreS. Lucia

Arzachena

Just 200 metres from Arzachena centre, the family-run S. Lucia is located on the Emerald Coast of Sardinia, 8 km from the beach. It offers a garden with free BBQ facilities and free Wi-Fi throughout... view morefrom

€ 40Hotel Delfino

Arzachena

Offering air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, Hotel Delfino is in Arzachena, just a 5-minute walk from the city’s centre. A varied breakfast is served every morning. The bright rooms are decorated with light-coloured furniture and curtains... view moreHotel Citti

Arzachena

Located in Arzachena, just a few minutes drive from the Costa Smeralda, Hotel Citti is situated on the Olbia-Palau road, giving you easy access to the surrounding area. Wi-Fi is free throughout... view morefrom

€ 30B&B Li Conchi

Arzachena

Offering rooms with classic décor, B&B Li Conchi is located in Arzachena. It features a terrace and free Wi-Fi in all areas. With free minibar, each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV, desk and a wardrobe... view morefrom
